definition: ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
earthquake intensity (measure of its destructive power)

sentences.english: High-amplitude events are very destructive and significant.
sentences.chinese: 高烈度事件具有相当的破坏性且十分重大。

sentences.english: The Mercalli Scale is based on observable earthquake damage.
sentences.chinese: 麦加利烈度是由可观测地震破坏确定的。

sentences.english: There are more than four thousand Seismic Intensity Meters in place throughout Japan to measure earthquake activity.
sentences.chinese: 有超过四千日本全国地震烈度表中来衡量地震活动。

sentences.english: Seismic intensity is a term frequently used.
sentences.chinese: 地震烈度是经常使用的一个名词。

sentences.english: There are more than four thousand seismic intensity meters in place across the country to measure earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 有超过四千在全国各地方来衡量地震烈度米。

sentences.english: Structure types of frame structure, seismic fortification intensity for seven degrees.
sentences.chinese: 布局范例为框架布局，抗震设防烈度为七度。

sentences.english: In the third step, the minimum cost design scheme corresponding to the optimum defense intensity will be found out.
sentences.chinese: 第三步，寻找相应于此最优烈度的最小造价设计。

sentences.english: Intensity measures the strength of shaking produced by the earthquake at a certain location.
sentences.chinese: 烈度测量的是在特定地点地震所产生的震动力。

definition: earthquake intensity (measure of its destructive power)
shallow earthquake (with epicenter less than 70 km deep)
powerful earthquake/abbr. for 強烈地震|强烈地震
